subject: Computer Science
title: Java Introduction
description: Java is a programming language that is very unique and solved many of the problems associated with monolithic languages like C++. Java is a high-level language that is platform-independent and can be used to create a wide variety of applications. Java is used in many different applications, from web applications to mobile applications to enterprise applications.
objectives: Understand the notion of compile anywhere, run anywhere
Understand the basic syntax of Java
Understand the basic data types in Java
Understand what is meant by object-oriented programming
prerequisites: Basic exposure to other programming languages
Familiarity with data types and variables
Understand the difference between compiled and interpreted languages
